name: sentient-frontend
description: The React-based Frontend for the SenTient Hybrid Reconciliation System.

dependencies.//_state_management: TanStack Query handles the Async Polling pattern defined in Docs/06_API_AND_FRONTEND.md
dependencies.//_virtualization: Mandatory for rendering 10k+ rows without DOM lag (Docs/06 Section 7)
dependencies.//_ui_components: Material UI for the heavy lifting, FontAwesome for icons
dependencies.//_utilities: Axios for API calls, clsx for conditional classes

devDependencies.//_build_tooling: Vite for HMR, TypeScript for type safety (aligned with SmartCell protocol)
devDependencies.//_testing: Vitest for unit tests, Cypress for E2E
